data.name: Email_Invite_Txt
data.value:
Hi!
I started using hike, a simple beautiful messaging app that's absolutely free.
hike comes with some hilarious emoticons. You can also post Status Updates to your close circle of friends! Think of it like BBM but much, much better!
Get it now and say good bye to plain boring SMS.
Get hike: http://get.hike.in

data.name: sms_invite_message_1
data.value: Hey, I'm using hike, and it has all these awesome stickers and emoticons which I want to share with you. Get it now http://hike.in/

data.name: sms_invite_message_2
data.value: Hey, I'm using hike, which lets us show our "last seen" status only to the friends we choose, and not everyone. Get it now http://hike.in/

data.name: sms_invite_message_3
data.value: Hey, I'm using hike; it comes with a cool Walkie-Talkie which lets me send you free voice messages. Get it now http://hike.in/
